Hadoop 2.7.3 Release Notes

These release notes include new developer and user-facing incompatibilities, features, and major improvements.

Changes since Hadoop 2.7.2

  • YARN-5309. Blocker bug reported by Thomas Friedrich and fixed by Weiwei Yang (timelineserver , yarn)
    Fix SSLFactory truststore reloader thread leak in TimelineClientImpl
  • YARN-5206. Minor bug reported by Steve Loughran and fixed by Steve Loughran (client , security)
    RegistrySecurity includes id:pass in exception text if considered invalid
  • YARN-5069. Major test reported by Eric Badger and fixed by Eric Badger (test)
    TestFifoScheduler.testResourceOverCommit race condition
  • YARN-5055. Minor bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Eric Badger (capacityscheduler , resourcemanager)
    max apps per user can be larger than max per queue
  • YARN-5009. Major bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Jason Lowe (nodemanager)
    NMLeveldbStateStoreService database can grow substantially leading to longer recovery times
  • YARN-5008. Major bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Jason Lowe (resourcemanager)
    LeveldbRMStateStore database can grow substantially leading to long recovery times
  • YARN-4940. Major bug reported by sandflee and fixed by sandflee
    yarn node -list -all failed if RM start with decommissioned node
  • YARN-4938. Major bug reported by Akira Ajisaka and fixed by Eric Badger (test)
    MiniYarnCluster should not request transitionToActive to RM on non-HA environment
  • YARN-4924. Major bug reported by Nathan Roberts and fixed by sandflee (nodemanager)
    NM recovery race can lead to container not cleaned up
  • YARN-4917. Minor bug reported by Takashi Ohnishi and fixed by Takashi Ohnishi (documentation)
    Fix typos in documentation of Capacity Scheduler.
  • YARN-4915. Trivial bug reported by Takashi Ohnishi and fixed by Takashi Ohnishi (documentation , yarn)
    Fix typo in YARN Secure Containers documentation
  • YARN-4850. Blocker bug reported by Allen Wittenauer and fixed by Yufei Gu (fairscheduler , test)
    test-fair-scheduler.xml isn't valid xml
  • YARN-4834. Major bug reported by Nathan Roberts and fixed by Nathan Roberts (nodemanager)
    ProcfsBasedProcessTree doesn't track daemonized processes
  • YARN-4794. Critical bug reported by Sumana Sathish and fixed by Jian He
    Deadlock in NMClientImpl
  • YARN-4785. Major bug reported by Jayesh and fixed by Varun Vasudev (webapp)
    inconsistent value type of the "type" field for LeafQueueInfo in response of RM REST API - cluster/scheduler
  • YARN-4773. Minor bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Jun Gong (nodemanager)
    Log aggregation performs extraneous filesystem operations when rolling log aggregation is disabled
  • YARN-4761. Major bug reported by Sangjin Lee and fixed by Sangjin Lee (fairscheduler)
    NMs reconnecting with changed capabilities can lead to wrong cluster resource calculations on fair scheduler
  • YARN-4760. Major bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Eric Badger (webapp)
    proxy redirect to history server uses wrong URL
  • YARN-4751. Major bug reported by Eric Payne and fixed by Eric Payne (capacity scheduler , yarn)
    In 2.7, Labeled queue usage not shown properly in capacity scheduler UI
  • YARN-4747. Major bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Varun Saxena (timelineserver)
    AHS error 500 due to NPE when container start event is missing
  • YARN-4723. Critical bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Kuhu Shukla (resourcemanager)
    NodesListManager$UnknownNodeId ClassCastException
  • YARN-4722. Major bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Jason Lowe
    AsyncDispatcher logs redundant event queue sizes
  • YARN-4707. Major bug reported by Brahma Reddy Battula and fixed by Brahma Reddy Battula (documentation)
    Remove the extra char (>) from SecureContainer.md
  • YARN-4706. Critical bug reported by Akira Ajisaka and fixed by Akira Ajisaka (documentation)
    UI Hosting Configuration in TimelineServer doc is broken
  • YARN-4690. Major improvement reported by Ming Ma and fixed by Ming Ma
    Skip object allocation in FSAppAttempt#getResourceUsage when possible
  • YARN-4686. Major bug reported by Rohith Sharma K S and fixed by Eric Badger (test)
    MiniYARNCluster.start() returns before cluster is completely started
  • YARN-4653. Major task reported by Steve Loughran and fixed by Steve Loughran (site)
    Document YARN security model from the perspective of Application Developers
  • YARN-4623. Major sub-task reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Naganarasimha G R (yarn)
    TestSystemMetricsPublisher#testPublishAppAttemptMetricsForUnmanagedAM fails with NPE
  • YARN-4610. Blocker bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Jason Lowe (capacityscheduler)
    Reservations continue looking for one app causes other apps to starve
  • YARN-4598. Major bug reported by tangshangwen and fixed by tangshangwen (nodemanager)
    Invalid event: RESOURCE_FAILED at CONTAINER_CLEANEDUP_AFTER_KILL
  • YARN-4581. Major bug reported by sandflee and fixed by sandflee (resourcemanager)
    AHS writer thread leak makes RM crash while RM is recovering
  • YARN-4556. Major bug reported by Akihiro Suda and fixed by Akihiro Suda (scheduler , test)
    TestFifoScheduler.testResourceOverCommit fails
  • YARN-4546. Critical bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Jason Lowe (resourcemanager)
    ResourceManager crash due to scheduling opportunity overflow
  • YARN-4492. Minor improvement reported by Naganarasimha G R and fixed by Naganarasimha G R (capacity scheduler)
    Add documentation for preemption supported in Capacity scheduler
  • YARN-4459. Major bug reported by Jun Gong and fixed by Jun Gong (nodemanager)
    container-executor should only kill process groups
  • YARN-4452. Critical bug reported by Naganarasimha G R and fixed by Naganarasimha G R
    NPE when submit Unmanaged application

    Clarify NMContainerStatus#toString method.

    Redirect RM page to AHS page when AHS turned on and RM page is not available

    Generic AHS sometimes doesn't show started, node, or logs on App page

    Nodemanager connection errors are retried at multiple levels
  • YARN-4398. Major bug reported by NING DING and fixed by NING DING (resourcemanager)
    Yarn recover functionality causes the cluster running slowly and the cluster usage rate is far below 100

    TestResourceLocalizationService.testDownloadingResourcesOnContainerKill fails intermittently
  • YARN-4374. Major bug reported by Chang Li and fixed by Chang Li (capacityscheduler)
    RM capacity scheduler UI rounds user limit factor
  • YARN-4347. Major bug reported by Yesha Vora and fixed by Jian He (yarn)
    Resource manager fails with Null pointer exception
  • YARN-4288. Critical bug reported by Junping Du and fixed by Junping Du (nodemanager)
    NodeManager restart should keep retrying to register to RM while connection exception happens during RM failed over.
  • YARN-4183. Major bug reported by Mit Desai and fixed by Naganarasimha G R
    Clarify the behavior of timeline service config properties
  • YARN-4121. Trivial bug reported by Kai Sasaki and fixed by Kai Sasaki (documentation)
    Typos in capacity scheduler documentation.
  • YARN-3849. Critical bug reported by Sunil G and fixed by Sunil G (capacityscheduler)
    Too much of preemption activity causing continuos killing of containers across queues
  • YARN-3840. Major bug reported by LINTE and fixed by Varun Saxena (resourcemanager)
    Resource Manager web ui issue when sorting application by id (with application having id > 9999)
  • YARN-3769. Major bug reported by Eric Payne and fixed by Eric Payne (capacityscheduler)
    Consider user limit when calculating total pending resource for preemption policy in Capacity Scheduler
  • YARN-3695. Major bug reported by Junping Du and fixed by Raju Bairishetti
    ServerProxy (NMProxy, etc.) shouldn't retry forever for non network exception.
  • YARN-3602. Minor test reported by zhihai xu and fixed by zhihai xu (test)
    TestResourceLocalizationService.testPublicResourceInitializesLocalDir fails Intermittently due to IOException from cleanup
  • YARN-3426. Blocker sub-task reported by Li Lu and fixed by Li Lu
    Add jdiff support to YARN
  • YARN-3404. Minor improvement reported by Ryu Kobayashi and fixed by Ryu Kobayashi
    View the queue name to YARN Application page
  • YARN-3362. Major sub-task reported by Wangda Tan and fixed by Naganarasimha G R (capacityscheduler , resourcemanager , webapp)
    Add node label usage in RM CapacityScheduler web UI
  • YARN-3102. Minor bug reported by Bibin A Chundatt and fixed by Kuhu Shukla (resourcemanager)
    Decommisioned Nodes not listed in Web UI
  • YARN-2046. Major bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Ming Ma (nodemanager)
    Out of band heartbeats are sent only on container kill and possibly too early
  • MAPREDUCE-6689. Blocker bug reported by Wangda Tan and fixed by Wangda Tan
    MapReduce job can infinitely increase number of reducer resource requests
  • MAPREDUCE-6680. Major bug reported by Junping Du and fixed by Junping Du (jobhistoryserver)
    JHS UserLogDir scan algorithm sometime could skip directory with update in CloudFS (Azure FileSystem, S3, etc.)
  • MAPREDUCE-6670. Minor bug reported by Gergely Novák and fixed by Gergely Novák (test)
    TestJobListCache#testEviction sometimes fails on Windows with timeout
    Backport the fix to 2.7 and 2.8
  • MAPREDUCE-6656. Blocker bug reported by J.Andreina and fixed by J.Andreina
    [NNBench] OP_DELETE operation isn't working after MAPREDUCE-6363
  • MAPREDUCE-6645. Major bug reported by Akira Ajisaka and fixed by Gabor Liptak (test)
    TestWordStats outputs logs under directories other than target/test-dir
  • MAPREDUCE-6637. Major bug reported by Brahma Reddy Battula and fixed by Brahma Reddy Battula (test)
    Testcase Failure : TestFileInputFormat.testSplitLocationInfo
  • MAPREDUCE-6635. Critical bug reported by Sergey Shelukhin and fixed by Junping Du
    Unsafe long to int conversion in UncompressedSplitLineReader and IndexOutOfBoundsException
  • MAPREDUCE-6633. Major bug reported by Rushabh S Shah and fixed by Rushabh S Shah
    AM should retry map attempts if the reduce task encounters commpression related errors.
  • MAPREDUCE-6622. Critical improvement reported by Ray Chiang and fixed by Ray Chiang (jobhistoryserver)
    Add capability to set JHS job cache to a task-based limit
    Two recommendations for the mapreduce.jobhistory.loadedtasks.cache.size property: 1) For every 100k of cache size, set the heap size of the Job History Server to 1.2GB. For example, mapreduce.jobhistory.loadedtasks.cache.size=500000, heap size=6GB. 2) Make sure that the cache size is larger than the number of tasks required for the largest job run on the cluster. It might be a good idea to set the value slightly higher (say, 20%) in order to allow for job size growth.
  • MAPREDUCE-6621. Major bug reported by Xuan Gong and fixed by Xuan Gong
    Memory Leak in JobClient#submitJobInternal()
  • MAPREDUCE-6619. Major bug reported by shanyu zhao and fixed by Junping Du (mrv2)
    HADOOP_CLASSPATH is overwritten in MR container
  • MAPREDUCE-6618. Major bug reported by Xuan Gong and fixed by Xuan Gong
    YarnClientProtocolProvider leaking the YarnClient thread.

  • MAPREDUCE-6460. Major bug reported by zhihai xu and fixed by zhihai xu (test)
    TestRMContainerAllocator.testAttemptNotFoundCausesRMCommunicatorException fails
  • MAPREDUCE-6436. Blocker improvement reported by Ryu Kobayashi and fixed by Kai Sasaki

  • MAPREDUCE-6413. Major bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by zhihai xu (test)

  • MAPREDUCE-6363. Critical bug reported by Brahma Reddy Battula and fixed by Bibin A Chundatt (benchmarks)
    [NNBench] Lease mismatch error when running with multiple mappers
  • MAPREDUCE-6302. Critical bug reported by mai shurong and fixed by Karthik Kambatla
    Preempt reducers after a configurable timeout irrespective of headroom
  • MAPREDUCE-6191. Minor test reported by sam liu and fixed by sam liu (test)
    TestJavaSerialization fails with getting incorrect MR job result
  • MAPREDUCE-5817. Major bug reported by Sangjin Lee and fixed by Sangjin Lee (applicationmaster)
    Mappers get rescheduled on node transition even after all reducers are completed
  • MAPREDUCE-5485. Critical improvement reported by Nemon Lou and fixed by Junping Du
    Allow repeating job commit by extending OutputCommitter API
    Previously, the MR job will get failed if AM get restarted for some reason (like node failure, etc.) during its doing commit job no matter if AM attempts reach to the maximum attempts. In this improvement, we add a new API isCommitJobRepeatable() to OutputCommitter interface which to indicate if job's committer can do commitJob again if previous commit work is interrupted by NM/AM failures, etc. The instance of OutputCommitter, which support repeatable job commit (like FileOutputCommitter in algorithm 2), can allow AM to continue the commitJob() after AM restart as a new attempt.
  • MAPREDUCE-4785. Major bug reported by Jason Lowe and fixed by Haibo Chen (mrv2 , test)
    TestMRApp occasionally fails
  • HDFS-10623. Major bug reported by Jitendra Nath Pandey and fixed by Hanisha Koneru (hdfs)
